description: This file defines the 'ListingScreen' widget, a main product listing page for a Flutter app. It includes UI components such as a gradient parallax header with search and filters, a grid of book items with staggered entrance animations, and filter modals. The screen interacts with mock data models and utilizes various custom widgets.

classes.name: ListingScreen
classes.description: Public-facing widget representing the product listing page with fanciful scrolling header, filters, and grid of books.

classes.name: _ListingScreenState
classes.description: State class managing filters, search, scrolling effects, and book list data.

methods.name: openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of the selected book.

methods.name: _showFilterSheet
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet allowing the user to set price range and category filters.

methods.name: _gridCrossAxisCount
methods.description: Determines grid column count based on device screen width.
